column4: For some reason the GDM will say it worked but simply flashes, maybe x11 isn't installed?
It stops flashing after a while and goes to text-mode login
I think the x11 isn't loading, because the console fonts aren't smoothened like usual
I used an upgrade to 7.10 with the alternate cd
if it was working with feisty, chances are it will work with Gutsy.
So why does it not show?
which driver did you use in gutsy?
An ATI one, but all I remember was it is radeon
i use nVidia, ask Vlet. he would know better about ATI. :P
